website_summaries.verdict: The blade mechanism on this mill moves so smoothly you'll hardly believe it's working.
pros: Sharp steel blade planes off nutmeg.Powerful spring-loaded brackets force nutmeg over blade
cons: Can come open and release the nutmeg shavings and nut if you accidentally twist the bottom instead of the top

customer_reviews.title: A dream
customer_reviews.text: This mill is a dream. I was skeptical because the supposedly good mills cost twice as much. This mill is so smooth that when I first used it, I did not even think it is working only to see a bunch of fine nutmeg shavings on the counter. placing the whole nutmeg is so easy, just put it in the chamber, close and go. You never know how much fresh ground nutmeg is superior to pre-ground nutmeg until you try it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark I.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It's wonderful to finally be able to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's wonderful to finally be able to use the last little bit of the nutmeg that is left after hand grating.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Huber

customer_reviews.title: Shaves nutmeg nicely. It takes a lot of turning to produce ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Shaves nutmeg nicely. It takes a lot of turning to produce a significant quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony E

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, easy way to get lots of nutmeg
customer_reviews.text: Works smoothly. Wonderful, easy way to get lots of nutmeg.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good looking Nutmeg grinder - seems to a good job. I like cap on bottom. No mess anymore on shelf.
customer_reviews.text: Grating Nutmeg. I only used it once so far, it seems to do a good job.
customer_reviews.author: M.Gehrig-Lister

customer_reviews.title: Grinds to powder
customer_reviews.text: This thing is better at grinding than a completionist multiplayer video gamer.
customer_reviews.author: vanh

customer_reviews.title: Not efficiently
customer_reviews.text: Does not grate much, you have to turn the handle a LONG time to get a few sprunkled
customer_reviews.author: Helene Forestier

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking at nutmeg grinders for a while. Glad I waited until I found this one, It doesn't takeup a lot of room because it doesn't have a handle to turn. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: cjw

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect Nutmeg Grinder!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little nutmeg grinder! It is a small and convenient size and works just perfectly. Amazing how many foods taste better with fresh nutmeg ground on top! Tastes awesome in my mug of hot tea as well. This grinder is my favorite new kitchen toy!
customer_reviews.author: TheDenverFan

customer_reviews.title: this nutmeg grinder is the answer to my prayers Can't imagine a better device to grind nutmeg
customer_reviews.text: I'm taking a star off because this came with no instructions. I finally Googled the company and found a video that explained everything. Other than that, this nutmeg grinder is the answer to my prayers Can't imagine a better device to grind nutmeg.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Heil

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I have not had a chance to use it much.
customer_reviews.author: Musiic-Mom

customer_reviews.title: BEST NUTMEG GRINDER!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this, you will love it. I have had a few nutmeg grinders and they were all a pain and didn't work well. This is effortless. It's amazing. I read a review and they said it was so smooth and easy, but I was skeptical. They were right, it takes virtually no effort. I like that it doesn't take up much space, as most all other grinders do.
customer_reviews.author: Atheist

customer_reviews.title: more for special occasions than for regular use
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my mom as a gift on her wishlist. She likes it, but she told me that it doesn't do a lot of output. She uses it more for special occasions than for regular use.
customer_reviews.author: b2cruise

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and excellent value
customer_reviews.text: My previous nutmeg grinder had a metal mechanism inside of an attractive wood cylinder. The screws mounting the mechanism to the wood did not hold sufficiently, and it frequently wasted the last of the nut. This grinder has a SUPERIOR design. It is built to last, and it grinds the nuts much more evenly.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this grater. I was buying nutmeg at the grocery store that comes in the grating jar, but I couldn't find it anymore. I bought this as a replacement, and I love it. It does an excellent job with whole nutmeg.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are useless, but you can figure out how it works
customer_reviews.text: Very cute dispenser. Instructions are useless, but you can figure out how it works. Works well and it is stylish. Fits the spices drawer...
customer_reviews.author: ItalianShopper

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far it works very well. I just hope it lasts- I had a grater that fell apart after a short time so I am a bit leery of nutmeg graters. Fingers crossed that it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Narie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! You have to grind from the top only or else it doesn't work. Small and sleek, with a modern stainless steel look!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Ashenhurst

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is fine machine! Hard to find this quality these days.The flakes are quite large if you're looking for a finer grain, but I quickly got used to it and love it.
customer_reviews.author: suzieq

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worthless, it falls apart when you try to use it. Do not throw your money away,
customer_reviews.author: beavercoyote

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good design and sharp cutters for nutmegs.Lid can be hard to stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Ciell

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!!
customer_reviews.text: Been hunting a long time for one. For the money, this one is the best. Its metal and heavy acrylic.....no cheap plastic parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Most excellent!!!! Sturdy well made grinder that works well. Very pleased with the product. Arrived in a timely fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Clarity

customer_reviews.title: Get one
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected for the price compared to other nutmeg grinders. Sleek look and excellent function.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This mill works great! Easier than my hand crank one. Actually shaves the nutmeg.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: well-designed, and it works!
customer_reviews.text: this little thing is elegant and loos lovely on the counter, and it's useful!
customer_reviews.author: B. Penna

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: It does everything as advertised. Looks good. Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kirke A.King

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I went without ground nutmeg at home for so long.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Gadget worth having
customer_reviews.text: This little guy does the job. It's just the right size for a nutmeg. Easy to load, & the prongs hold the nutmeg securely while you twist the top. It produces almost translucently thin shavings, & absolutely no danger of grating one's fingers in the process!
customer_reviews.author: Aviva

customer_reviews.title: Made in China, not Germany as some reviewer says
customer_reviews.text: I bought this believing it's made in Germany based on some reviews. Also I liked the size/shape. But after I opened the box, I felt it strangely light weight. I wondered if it really is made in Germany - after looking around the box for a while, I finally found very tiny letters of 'made in PRC' next to bar code on the bottom of the box. Very disappointed. I am returning this and going back to Peugeot Nutmeg Grinder which for sure is made in France (wish there were US made ones available!).
customer_reviews.author: Zangou - se o cravo com a rosa

customer_reviews.title: This is the one
customer_reviews.text: Well made and easy to use. The shaver is so smooth, the nutmeg is easy to place. You can store two in the acrylic case on top which is a nice display. So easy to use. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good nutmeg grinder
customer_reviews.text: Good nutmeg grinder. The construction does not really clue you in on how to disassemble to load a nut.
customer_reviews.author: BobC

product_meta.title: Adhoc Muskatino Stainless Steel and Acrylic Nutmeg Mill, 5-Inch
product_meta.description: At Ado, our goal is to develop lifestyle accessories for kitchen and table top, which combine highest quality standards with aesthetic and functional design. Products made for now. Many dishes develop a special, delicate flavor only after a pinch of nutmeg has been added. Thanks to Muskatino, grating nutmeg is now a breeze and fingers are no longer in danger. This small manual mill grinds the nutmeg fresh and without a mess. And, as an extra convenience: the air tight transparent container easily stores the nutmeg seeds. Grinding nutmeg has never been easier or safer!.
feature_bullets: Sharp steel blade planes off nutmeg
Powerful spring-loaded brackets force nutmeg over blade
